actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Legionville National Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands for the establishment of Legionville National Historic Site, Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Legionville National Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania.
